subject: Order SSN2069
description_text:
Hi,

One of the VAM motors has stopped working from order SSN2069. I tried
swapping out the control box and used a different motor to verify it's not
an issue with the control box. Can you provide troubleshooting or a
replacement?

Thanks,
Greg Helms

conversations.body_text: Hi Greg Helms,  We apologize for the inconvenience, we will reissue you two VAMs.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEIZ1649069217YQ
